applicant-name.name: SHANDONG JIRAN HYDROGEN POWER CO LTD
山东济燃氢动力有限公司

invention-title: Vertical teaching platform for green hydrogen production and storage
一种绿氢制储用立式教学平台

abstract.p: The invention relates to the technical field of education technologies and renewable energy sources, and discloses a vertical teaching platform for green hydrogen production and storage, which comprises a photovoltaic display module, a hydrogen production module, a hydrogen storage module, a fuel cell module, a direct-current load module, an alternating-current load module and a control module, wherein the photovoltaic display module is used for displaying the structure and the principle of a photovoltaic panel and providing power input; the hydrogen production module comprises an electrolytic bath, a water storage barrel, a transformer, a gas-water separator and a drying agent, and is used for producing hydrogen and carrying out drying treatment; the hydrogen storage module comprises a hydrogen storage bottle, a related pipeline and a valve body and is used for storing dry hydrogen. The practical application of photovoltaic energy conversion, electrolytic hydrogen production of water and electric energy is integrated through the platform, and a closed-loop teaching system is formed. The integration mode enables students to intuitively understand the complete process of energy collection, conversion to storage and application, and the continuity and practicability of teaching are enhanced.

本申请涉及教育技术和可再生能源技术领域，公开了一种绿氢制储用立式教学平台，包括光伏展示模块、制氢模块、储氢模块、燃料电池模块、直流负载模块、交流负载模块以及控制模块，其中光伏展示模块用于展示光伏板的构造及其原理并提供电源输入；制氢模块包括电解槽、储水桶、变压器、气水分离器和干燥剂，用于产生氢气并进行干燥处理；储氢模块包括储氢瓶及其相关管道和阀体，用于存储干燥氢气。通过平台综合了光伏能源转换、水的电解制氢、电能的实际应用，形成一个闭环的教学系统。这种集成方式使学生能够直观地理解从能源的采集、转换到存储和应用的完整过程，增强了教学的连贯性和实用性。
